exercises.name: INCREASE VERTICAL JUMP TODAY With These 5 Exercises!
exercises.description: In this video, Coach Rocky gives you 5 exercises to add to your next workout to increase your vertical jump. To improve your vertical jump you not only need strong legs, but you need a strong core as well. These exercises will Increase your leg strength, agility, and most importantly, your core. If you are looking to jump higher, the exercises will definitely help you get there!
exercises.body: In this video, Coach Rocky gives you 5 exercises to add to your next workout to increase your vertical jump. To improve your vertical jump you not only need strong legs, but you need a strong core as well. These exercises will Increase your leg strength, agility, and most importantly, your core. If you are looking to jump higher, the exercises will definitely help you get there!

exercises.name: Top 18 Strength Exercises For Basketball Players
exercises.description: Searching for exercises that will make you a stronger and better basketball player? Watch as we walk through 18 seldom used strength exercises that you can do in or out of season with little to no equipment!
exercises.body: Searching for exercises that will make you a stronger and better basketball player? Watch as we walk through 18 seldom used strength exercises that you can do in or out of season with little to no equipment!

exercises.name: Basketball Strength Exercises

exercises.body: Chad Hobbs demonstrates 3 exercises to help improve your basketball strength.

exercises.name: Strength Exercises For Basketball Players - Core Exercises To Become More Explosive!
exercises.description: Want to become a more explosive player? Many players think they only have to train their lower body to improve their vertical jump and become more explosive, however, the core and upper body are important as well.
exercises.body: Want to become a more explosive player? Many players think they only have to train their lower body to improve their vertical jump and become more explosive, however, the core and upper body are important as well. Today Coach Rocky is going to go through some of his favorite most effective core exercises that will help build you into an explosive basketball player.

exercises.name: The 8 Basketball Warm Up Exercises That Are A MUST Before A Game!
exercises.description: Don’t play another game or do another workout without doing these 8 key basketball warm up exercises! You must do these before your next game.
exercises.body: Don’t play another game or do another workout without doing these 8 key basketball warm up exercises! You must do these before your next game.

exercises.name: How To: WARM UP For Basketball!
exercises.description: How to warm up for basketball. In this video coach rocky breaks down a great warm up routine that you can implement before training or playing.
exercises.body: How to warm up for basketball. In this video coach rocky breaks down a great warm up routine that you can implement before training or playing.

exercises.name: How to Build Stamina for Basketball
exercises.description: How to Build Stamina for Basketball. Part of the series: Basketball Tips. In order to build stamina for basketball, it's important to do drills like suicides, which involve a player running to the free throw line, half court, the opposing free throw line and the opposing baseline before returning each time.
exercises.body: How to Build Stamina for Basketball. Part of the series: Basketball Tips. In order to build stamina for basketball, it's important to do drills like suicides, which involve a player running to the free throw line, half court, the opposing free throw line and the opposing baseline before returning each time.

exercises.name: LeBron Dribbling Double Suicide Conditioning Drill | Endurance Stamina Basketball | Dre Baldwin
DeMatha Basketball Competitive Conditioning Drills
exercises.description: Winning is a habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
exercises.body: 'Winning is a habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.' At DeMatha, we believe in reinforcing sound work habits on a daily basis. One of the habits we constantly reinforce is the desire to compete. Winning is important. Wanting to win, preparing to win, and competing to win all go hand in hand.

exercises.name: World's Greatest Balance Exercise for Basketball: Clock Reaches
exercises.description: Every single skill in the game of basketball drastically decreases when you are off balance. So learning how to get in, stay in, and move from a position of balance is essential to high performance. Barefoot clock reaches (with or without your eyes closed) is an excellent way to work on your proprioception, balance and foot/ankle strength and mobility.
exercises.body: Every single skill in the game of basketball drastically decreases when you are off balance. So learning how to get in, stay in, and move from a position of balance is essential to high performance. Barefoot clock reaches (with or without your eyes closed) is an excellent way to work on your proprioception, balance and foot/ankle strength and mobility.
